(MON TA Report 54085) 
 
CONTRIBUTION TO STRATEGY 2030 OPERATIONAL PRIORITIES

No.  (Outputs and Outcomes)  Expected Value  Methods and Comments 
       
2.3.1  Women with strengthened  15  At least 50 basic public service workers

service standardization

6.1.2  Measures supported in  1  At least 1 measure to improve the 
implementation to improve  capacities of a least 35 staff, of which 
capacity of public  30% are female, on further enhancing 
organizations to promote the  the negative list system of market 
private sector and the  access  
finance sector (number)   
 
6.2.1  Service delivery standards  1  Policy note incorporating TA 
adopted and/or supported in  recommendations on service delivery 
implementation by  performance management and market 
government and/or private  access regulation submitted for 
entities (number)  adoption by NDRC leadership 
       
NDRC = National Development and Reform Commission, OP = operational priority, TA = technical assistance. 
Source: Asian Development Bank.
